Control Statement: The organization: (a) Conducts an organizational assessment of risk prior to the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services; and(b) Ensures that the acquisition or outsourcing of dedicated information security services is approved by [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles].
